meanings.sent1: The sunscreen is noncarcinogenic, so it won't give you cancer.
meanings.sent2: It is important to choose noncarcinogenic products to protect your health.
meanings.sent3: I only use noncarcinogenic ingredients in my homemade skincare products.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and noncarcinogenic as a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The noncarcinogenic label on the food packaging reassured me of its safety.

meanings.sent1: The lab results confirmed that the substance was noncarcinogenic.
meanings.sent2: The company prides itself on producing noncarcinogenic cleaning products.
meanings.sent3: The noncarcinogenic paint was a hit among environmentally conscious consumers.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a noncarcinogenic breath of fresh air in the toxic environment.
meanings.sent5: The noncarcinogenic nature of the new building materials was a breakthrough in construction.
